maxLength: The {attribute} must not be greater than {max} characters.
minLength: The {attribute} must be at least {min} characters.
isAlpha: SHould not Contain Numbers or Special Symbols
isEmail: The {attribute} must be a valid email address.

isOnlyDate: The {attribute} must be a valid date.
isUrl: The {attribute} must be a valid URL.
